lead_paragraph: HIRSCHBERG--Gary, of Manhattan and previously of Mamaroneck, died on January 4, 2016. Beloved husband of Virginia. Loving father of Stacy (Andrew) and Amanda (Dan). Adoring grandfather of Phoebe, Parker, Zachary, Brady, and Skylar. Devoted husband of the late Peggy. A graveside service will be held today, 11:00am, at Mt. Hope Cemetery, 50 Jackson Ave., Hastings-On-Hudson, NY 10706. In lieu of flowers, gifts may be made to M.I.T. in memory of Gary Hirschberg, '61 at giving.mit.edu. 1/3
